name: NeonPong
description:
Welcome to NeonPong! Introduction

This is a pong game created in Godot Game Engine to learn to use the engine and learn more about GameDev.

All the code is available in my GitHub so you can download it, and feel free to modify it as you want :)

Controls

Blue Pad -> W (up) and S (down)

Red Pad -> Up Arrow (up) and Down Arrow (down)
